sentences.en: a strong cardboard box
sentences.cn: 一只结实的纸板箱

sentences.en: all those magical effects were produced by this little box of tricks here.
sentences.cn: 所有这些魔术效应都是通过这个小玩意儿搞出来的。

sentences.en: He miskicked the ball twice at the edge of the penalty box.
sentences.cn: 在禁区边缘他两次将球踢飞。

sentences.en: He ran his fingers along the inside walls of the box.
sentences.cn: 他用手指摸了摸盒子的内壁。

sentences.en: Help me box up the Christmas tree lights.
sentences.cn: 帮我把圣诞彩灯装进盒子。

sentences.en: His girlfriend had gone into the witness box and taken the oath.
sentences.cn: 他的女朋友进入证人席并立了誓。

sentences.en: I had to box Max's ears to get him to hush.
sentences.cn: 我不得不打了马克斯一耳光让他闭嘴。

sentences.en: I lifted the box and ran my fingers lovingly over the top.
sentences.cn: 我拎起盒子，爱惜地抚摩着盒盖。

sentences.en: I untied the bow and unwrapped the small box.
sentences.cn: 我解开蝴蝶结，拆开小盒子的包装。

sentences.en: Jim watched the game from a private box.
sentences.cn: 吉姆在私人包厢里观看比赛。

sentences.en: Martinez expressed confidence of victory at the ballot box.
sentences.cn: 马丁内斯表示了对选举获胜的信心。

sentences.en: On the table sat a box decorated with little pearl triangles.
sentences.cn: 桌上有一只用珠子串成的小三角形作装饰的盒子。

sentences.en: Please lift the box down from the shelf for me.
sentences.cn: 请帮我把这只箱子从搁板上抬下来。

sentences.en: She ate two boxes of chocolates.
sentences.cn: 她吃了两盒巧克力。

sentences.en: she had to box clever, let Adam think she had accepted what he said.
sentences.cn: 她不得不耍个花招，让亚当相信她已经接受了他的观点。

sentences.en: The film has taken £180 million at the box office.
sentences.cn: 这部电影票房收入已达1.8亿英镑。

sentences.en: The film opened to healthy box office receipts before rapidly falling off.
sentences.cn: 这部影片的票房收入开始的时候持续上涨，但是后来急剧下降。

sentences.en: the jury box
sentences.cn: 陪审团席

sentences.en: The major box office attraction was, of course, the inimitable Peter Hunningale.
sentences.cn: 无人能比的彼得·亨宁格尔自然是主要的票房吸引力所在。

sentences.en: the novel is nothing out of the box.
sentences.cn: 这本小说并不出色。

sentences.en: The original script was written with the idiot box in mind.
sentences.cn: 剧本当初就是为电视而写的。

sentences.en: The seal on the box broke when it fell from its hiding-place.
sentences.cn: 盒子从隐藏处掉落时，封口裂开了。

sentences.en: There has been a falling-off in box office income and other earnings.
sentences.cn: 票房及其他收入已经下降。

sentences.en: They were part of the black box associated with high-flyer management development.
sentences.cn: 它们是与储备主管培训相关的神秘体系的一部分。

sentences.en: You should rip the cover off the box first.
sentences.cn: 你首先应当把这个盒子的封套扯掉。

words.tran_cn: 拳击；装箱；围模；做箱的材料

phrases.tran_cn: (澳/新西兰，非正式)旺盛的士气；快乐
vt. 矩形缩小；盒状收缩；围起来
n. 操纵台，控制箱，操作箱
处于困境：在一个非常困难或受限的处境
在盒子里；在方框中；（美俚，禁忌语）（男人）正与女人性交
灯箱；标准灯箱；照光盒；航行识别灯控制箱
(英，非正式)喝醉的；（因酒精或毒品的作用而）兴奋的
(非正式)创造性地思考；富有革新精神地思考；不受条条框框束缚地思考

trans.tran_cn: 盒子，箱子，方框，包厢，电视机，邮箱
trans.tran_en: a container for putting things in, especially one with four stiff straight sides
a container for putting things in, especially one with four stiff straight sides
to fight someone as a sport by hitting them with your closed hands inside big leather  glove s
